timeline.message:
Add Parser interfaces and domains.

- StreamItem is in 'com.hedera.mirror.importer.parser.domain' for now.
  IF its scope increases/changes in future refactoring, we can move/rename it
- Adding subinterfaces only for the record stream since they will
  be used in followup PRs
- Not adding subinterfaces for balance stream since it's not clear
  when we'll come around to refactor that part of code

Signed-off-by: Apekshit Sharma <apekshit.sharma@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: nit: private final, for consistency. Unless you plan to have it modified during processing
timeline.author: Nana-EC
